acidity.notes: Very slight tang (probably tastringency rather than acidicity). Not enough to make me think of a particular fruit.

finish.notes: Took several sips, but I feel my tongue is slightly dried out like after having black tea. Mouthfeel is somewhat zincy.

flavor: Missing the fruit note that was there in another cup at grind 23. Pleasant body but rather flat and weak tastewise. Mouth still feels dry so definitely astringent.
observations: I used as little agitation as possible. Coffee bed was a little humpy after drawdown in spite (or because of?) large swirl.
actionItem: Increase grind to 22. If astringent feeling goes away, then play with the ratio or slow down pour to increase perceived strength.
